Song.title: Make Me Faithful
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge © 2009 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: C | C | Am | F :||]
Verse 1: [C] Jesus, You came, a servant [G] [ ]to do Your [C]Father’s will [C] Through Satan’s worst temptations [G] You were o[C]bedient still [F] You are the [Am]Rock of Ages,{,} [G] [ ]You are so [Csus]faith[C]ful [F] Though I grow [Am]weak and weary [G]You will make me stand
Chorus: [C]I want to be like [G]You are,{,} [Dm] I want to be [F]faithful [C]Help me to be like [G]You are. [Dm] Oh, make me [F]faithful [| C | C | Am | F]
Verse 2: [C] I, too, must be a servant,{,} [G] [ ]today and [C]all my days [C] To use the gifts You’ve given [G] To bring You [C]joy and praise [F] Though I am [Am]sure to fail You,{,} [G] [ ]You are so [Csus]faith[C]ful [F] And though I [Am]stumble,{,} You will [G]pick me up again
Bridge: [Dm]Jesus, [G]You’re my faithful [C]friend [Dm]You will [F]help me till the [G]end
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 jesus you came a servant to do your fathers will through satans worst temptations you were obedient still you are the rock of ages you are so faithful though i grow weak and weary you will make me stand chorus i want to be like you are i want to be faithful help me to be like you are oh make me faithful verse 2 i too must be a servant today and all my days to use the gifts youve given to bring you joy and praise though i am sure to fail you you are so faithful and though i stumble you will pick me up again bridge jesus youre my faithful friend you will help me till the end
